Models¶

class models.User(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

User class.

Used as a model for the database, containing methods to be performed on user objects.

DoesNotExist¶

alias of UserDoesNotExist

classmethod create_user(first_name, last_name, email_address, password, user_role)[source]¶

Creates user.

Takes in parameters and uses them to create a row in the user table of the database. It takes in a plain text password but hashes it before inputting to the database.

Parameters:
  • first_name – users first name
  • last_name – user last name
  • email_address – users email address
  • password – users password (plain text)
  • user_role – the role of the user (determines permissions)
Returns:
